name: Symantec License File
summary: Learn about .SLF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Some editions of Symantec software do not require the SLF file to be installed.

description: File used by Symantec software to activate software licenses; contains activation codes that are registered with Symantec; allows users to legally use a copy of Symtantec software.
